statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 8 \\ 4 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -32 \\ -19 \\ -49 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
